description: UI rework to remove 'vibe code' feel and create a calmer, polished SaaS UI

userStories.title: Design tokens + baseline polish
userStories.description: Establish consistent spacing/typography defaults and background layers.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages show consistent card padding and readable type scale
Focus rings are visible and consistent across inputs/buttons
userStories.notes: Prefer CSS variables in globals.css and shadcn theme conventions

userStories.title: Standard page header component
userStories.description: Create a reusable PageHeader used on dashboard/transactions/receipts/insights/settings.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has consistent title/subtitle/actions layout (desktop + mobile)
userStories.notes: Reusable component with title, subtitle, and right-side actions

userStories.title: Dashboard redesign pass
userStories.description: Calm the dashboard grid: align cards, unify chart containers, improve empty states.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard reads as a cohesive set of cards (consistent headers/padding)
Loading/empty states are intentional (no jumpy layout)

userStories.title: Transactions filters + list density
userStories.description: Improve filters layout, spacing, and default states; reduce visual noise. Improve transaction row typography, spacing, hover/selection clarity.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter bar is usable on mobile without horizontal overflow
Selection state is obvious without heavy borders
Existing virtualization and data-testid hooks remain intact
userStories.notes: Do NOT remove or rename existing Playwright data-testid hooks

userStories.title: Bulk actions bar visual update
userStories.description: Make bulk actions feel 'product-grade': spacing, button sizing, clearer primary/secondary actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Bulk actions bar is readable and not visually overpowering
userStories.notes: Maintain existing behavior and test hooks

userStories.title: Receipts inbox + review drawer redesign
userStories.description: Improve inbox list readability; make review drawer hierarchy clearer (confidence, error, required fields).
acceptanceCriteria: Confirm flow remains unchanged; required fields are obvious
userStories.notes: Do not change confirm flow behavior

userStories.title: Insights page polish
userStories.description: Unify insight cards, severity emphasis, and drilldown UX.
acceptanceCriteria: Insight list reads cleanly (no noisy borders)
userStories.notes: Keep existing insight generation logic unchanged

userStories.title: Settings + auth pages refinement
userStories.description: Improve form layout, spacing, and inline help copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Forms have consistent widths and spacing
Dev login button remains visible only under existing env rules
userStories.notes: Do not change auth logic or dev login conditions
